When [[Smith Smithson]], the title character of the story ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'', became a smith (following his father) it was said that he was the best between '''Far Easton''' and the [[Westwood]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]''</ref>

In the United Kingdom there are three Eastons: One is a [[Wikipedia:Easton, Bristol|council ward]] within the city of Bristol.  In Essex there are two â€“ "[[Wikipedia:Little Easton|Little Easton]]", a village that dates to the twelfth century, and "[[Wikipedia:Great Easton, Essex|Great Easton]]", a village one mile north of Little Easton.
